definition: two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Schwannomas and neurofibromas are benign lesions that are thought to arise from neoplastic transformation of nerve sheath cells.
sentences.chinese: 前兩者是良性腫瘤，一般認爲來自神經鞘細胞的瘤變。

sentences.english: Marx, with his usual perversity, thought it was both.
sentences.chinese: 馬克思，帶着慣常的倔強，認爲它兩者都是。

sentences.english: I differentiate the two by the simple practice of hand-coding.
sentences.chinese: 我是通過簡單的手編程序的簡單練習來區別兩者的。

sentences.english: In theory, both proposals have legitimate justifications.
sentences.chinese: 從理論上說，兩者都有充分的理由。

sentences.english: The issue becomes vaguer because of the same origin of space and life.
sentences.chinese: 這個問題已經越來越模糊了，因爲其實兩者本屬同根。

sentences.english: There is supposed to be a deep symmetry between them.
sentences.chinese: 應該說它們兩者之間有着深刻的對稱性。

sentences.english: Using both together, you can calculate an average.
sentences.chinese: 兩者結合起來可以計算平均值。

sentences.english: Hence, we give a new expression of Slaving Principle and study its relation to Adiabatic Approximation.
sentences.chinese: 爲此給出了役使原理的新表述，並探討兩者的關係。

sentences.english: In this case, I believe the two are not inconsistent.
sentences.chinese: 對於這個問題，我相信兩者並不矛盾。

sentences.english: And both of them have comparatively systematic thought contents on education.
sentences.chinese: 而這兩者都有比較完善的關於教育的思想內容。

sentences.english: If you would make them exactly the same, the right sidebearing of the P would be much too big.
sentences.chinese: 如果兩者完全一樣，“P”的右部空間就顯得太大了。

sentences.english: The only difference between the two elements is their visibility.
sentences.chinese: 兩者之間的唯一區別是他們的可見度。

sentences.english: The problem is that whenever antimatter comes into contact with regular matter, the two annihilate.
sentences.chinese: 反物質一旦接觸到普通物質，兩者即會同時湮滅。

sentences.english: PC 6 is exactly opposite, on the inner forearm between the two tendons.
sentences.chinese: 籌委會6剛好相反筋，對兩者之間的內在前臂。

sentences.english: Quest, question, there is no coincidence that there is an etymological link between the two.
sentences.chinese: 探索，問題，這兩者在詞源上有所關聯並非巧合。

definition: whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
relation/relationship/to concern/to affect/to have to do with/guanxi/CL:個|个[ge4]
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
